original_text: He also did what was evil in the sight of the Lord. He did not depart from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which he made Israel to sin, but he walked in them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 모든 죄에서 떠나지 아니하고 그 가운데 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: He also did what was evil in the sight of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그도 또한 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였더라.

sentences.original_text: He did not depart from all the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 모든 죄에서 떠나지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: which he made Israel to sin,
